00076 #include <cstring>
00077 
00078 #include <trex/agent/Agent.hh>
00079 #include <trex/agent/RealTimeClock.hh>
00080 #include <trex/agent/StepClock.hh>
00081 
00082 using namespace TREX::agent;
00083 using namespace TREX::utils;
00084 
00109 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00110   if (argc < 2 || argc > 4) {
00111     std::cerr << "Invalid argument list:"
00112              <<"\n Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [-sim [steps]]"
00113              << std::endl;
00114     return -1;
00115   }
00116   char *configFile = argv[1];
00117   std::auto_ptr<Clock> clk;
00118     
00119   if( argc>=3 ) {
00120     Symbol simOption = argv[2];
00121     if( simOption=="-sim" ) {
00122       size_t stepsPerTick = 60;
00123       
00124       if( argc==4 )
00125        stepsPerTick = string_cast<size_t>(argv[3]);
00126       clk.reset(new StepClock(0, stepsPerTick));
00127     } else {
00128       std::cerr<<"Invalid 2nd argument "<<simOption.str()
00129               <<"\nUsage: "<<argv[0]<<" configFile [-sim [steps]]"
00130               <<std::endl;
00131       return -1;
00132     }
00133   }
00134   Agent agent(configFile, clk.release());
00135   agent.setClock(new RealTimeClock(1.0));
00136   agent.run();
00137   return 0;
00138 }
